string-array.item: How to create decks and add flashcards\?
Can I download my decks for offline use\?

resources.string: Developed by three Computer Science students, Mavi, Andre, and Rose.

They know too well the struggles of studyingâ€” with endless papers on the table and highlighted words squeezing the brain, they thought of a technique convenient and efficient enough to assist the students with their workload.
This is where Nerdi gets in the picture, as it was created to be your personal study buddy.
